Sikkim Rising Star 2024

March 1 - June 15, 2024
Multiple locations across Sikkim

The fourth season of Sikkim Rising Star promises to be the biggest yet, with increased prize money, expanded categories, and unprecedented opportunities for talented performers.

Register Now

Key Features

₹10 Lakhs total prize pool
Professional mentorship program
National media coverage
Industry connections & opportunities

Competition Categories

Singing

Solo and duet performances across all genres

  • Winner: ₹3,00,000
  • 1st Runner-up: ₹1,50,000

Dancing

Classical, contemporary, and folk dance forms

  • Winner: ₹3,00,000
  • 1st Runner-up: ₹1,50,000

Music

Instrumental and band performances

  • Winner: ₹3,00,000
  • 1st Runner-up: ₹1,50,000
